thread.section_title: River Palace Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Pleased
thread.title_full: Very Pleased - Review of River Palace Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Chancellor3
title: Very Pleased
text:
My wife and I were very pleased with our stay. The location, just two blocks from the Piazza Pocolo and the subway system, was perfect, placing us in excellent location close to the Spanish Steps, the two stop subway ride to St. Peter's, and easy access to the coliseum and meeting spots for the daily tours we enjoyed.
The hotel staff were most helpful, the breakfasts excellent, and the daily happy hour in the bar a pleasant way to finish our long days of site seeing.
The rooms are typically European and thus smaller than American standards but we were very comfortable and satisfied. The main benefit, though, is the hotel's location.
